text: sumanh-eun seonjijaga jeontue chamjeonhayeoss-eumyeo jisig-eul gajchun manh-eun sin-ang-indeul-i geuwa hamkke hayeossnola. geudeul-eun hananim-ui gil-eseo geudeul-ege majdagtteulin geos-eul iyulo nayaghaejigeona heoyaghaejigeona gulboghaji anh-assnola. hananimkkeseoneun innaehaneun jadeul-eul salanghasinola
